item.title: 萨默斯、伯南克忆费舍尔为杰出经济学者
item.description: 斯坦利-费舍尔（Stanley Fischer）作为世界各地经济界名人的导师，于周日受到缅怀。【原文：Stanley Fischer was remembered Sunday as a mentor to economic luminaries around the world.】

item.title: 秘鲁利马 5 月通胀指数意外下降
item.description: 秘鲁首都的通货膨胀率在 5 月份略有下降，出乎经济学家的意料，他们原本预测会略有上升。【原文：Inflation in Peru’s capital fell slightly in the month of May, surprising economists who were forecasting a small increase.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克领导人排除了对卡齐米尔重返州长职位的支持
item.description: 斯洛伐克领导人罗伯特-菲佐周日表示，总理罗伯特-菲佐将不会支持重新任命彼得-卡齐米尔为斯洛伐克央行行长。【原文：Prime Minister Robert Fico will not support the reappointment of Peter Kazimir as head of Slovakia’s central bank, the Slovak leader said on Sunday.】

item.title: 利润引擎嗡嗡作响，大型科技公司重回 S&P 500 指数驾驶席
item.description: 4 月份曾将标准普尔 500 指数拖入熊市边缘的科技巨头们，正在为美国股市的复苏提供一些动力。【原文：The same technology giants that helped drag the S&P 500 to the brink of a bear market in April are giving the recovery in US equities some legs.】

item.title: 贝森特称美国绝不会违约，国会面临最后期限
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，随着提高联邦债务上限的最后期限日益临近，美国 "绝不会违约"。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the US “is never going to default” as the deadline for increasing the federal debt ceiling gets closer.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行降息后澳大利亚房价继续攀升
item.description: 澳大利亚房价连续第四个月攀升，原因是该国央行第二次降息，而且预计今年晚些时候还会有更多降息。【原文：Australian home prices climbed for a fourth straight month, driven by a second interest rate cut by the country’s central bank and expectations more will follow later this year.】

item.title: 台湾中央银行警告出口商防范货币投机
item.description: 台湾中央银行加强了对当地贸易公司购汇行为的警告，以再次抑制外汇市场的投机行为，维护台币的稳定。【原文：Taiwan’s Central Bank strengthened its warning to local trading companies over their currency purchases as it seeks once again to tamp down speculation on foreign exchange markets and maintain the stability of the Taiwan dollar.】

item.title: 墨西哥从数十名鲜为人知的候选人中选出法官
item.description: 墨西哥选民将于周日前往投票站开始挑选法官，这是一次史无前例的选举，总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）可能会对改革后的司法机构产生广泛影响，而司法机构是她的政党唯一没有控制的政府部门。【原文：Mexican voters head to the polls on Sunday to begin picking judges in an unprecedented election that could give President Claudia Sheinbaum broad influence over a revamped judiciary, the only branch of government her party doesn’t control.】

item.title: 新兴货币反弹，套利交易重获青睐
item.description: 随着有迹象表明美国总统唐纳德-特朗普激进的关税政策可能不会全面实施，货币波动性减弱，新兴市场利差交易再次起飞。【原文：Emerging market carry trades are taking off again, as currency volatility subsides amid signs President Donald Trump’s aggressive tariffs may not get fully enacted.】

item.title: 乌克兰无人机袭击俄罗斯境内四个军用机场
item.description: 据乌克兰安全局的一名消息人士称，乌克兰无人机周日袭击了数个俄罗斯军用机场，其中包括位于西伯利亚东部深处的贝拉亚军事基地。【原文：Ukrainian drones hit several Russian military airfields Sunday, including Belaya military base deep in eastern Siberia, according to a source with Ukraine’s Security Service.】

item.title: 苹果开发者大会将显示其离成为人工智能领导者还很远
item.description: 苹果公司在首次推出人工智能平台一年后，在 WWDC 大会上几乎没有表现出追赶 OpenAI 和谷歌等领先企业的态势。还有：最新的 macOS 采用了全新的加利福尼亚主题；了解苹果公司为什么要改用 iOS 26 和 macOS 26 命名系统；以及苹果公司专用游戏应用程序的详细信息。【原文：Apple, a year after debuting its AI platform, will do little at WWDC to show it’s catching up to leaders like OpenAI and Google. Also: The latest macOS gets its new California theme; a look at why the company is moving to an iOS 26 and macOS 26 naming system; and details on Apple’s dedicated gaming app.】

item.title: IndiGo 与达美航空公司、法荷航空公司和维珍航空公司结盟，推进全球发展
item.description: 经营 IndiGo 的 InterGlobe 航空公司宣布与达美航空、法荷航和维珍大西洋航空达成代码共享协议，印度市场的领导者加倍努力扩大其全球影响力。【原文：InterGlobe Aviation, which operates IndiGo, announced a codesharing pact with Delta Air Lines Inc., Air France-KLM and Virgin Atlantic Airways Ltd. as the India market leader doubles down on expanding its global reach.】

item.title: 乌克兰在计划会谈前面临俄罗斯的持续炮击
item.description: 在基辅和莫斯科计划于本周举行会谈之前，乌克兰于周日早些时候遭到了俄罗斯导弹和无人机最长时间的袭击，空中警报持续了 9 个多小时。【原文：Ukraine came under one of the longest barrages from Russian missiles and drones early Sunday, with air sirens lasting for more then 9 hours, ahead of planned talks between Kyiv and Moscow this week.】

item.title: 一周大幅打折后，比亚迪五月份销量创今年新高
item.description: 比亚迪公司 5 月份的销售额是今年以来最好的，因为该月最后几天提供的大幅折扣吸引顾客走进展厅。【原文：BYD Co.’s sales for May were its best this year after heavy discounts offered during the final days of the month lured customers into showrooms.】

item.title: 国际航空运输协会（IATA）会长称航空业受益于油价下跌
item.description: 国际航空运输协会（IATA）行业协会负责人表示，全球航空业正从油价下跌中受益，因为油价下跌降低了煤油的成本。【原文：The global aviation industry is benefiting from lower oil prices because they’re bringing down the cost of kerosene, the head of the IATA industry association said.】

item.title: 主导美国期权市场的量化交易员进军欧洲
item.description: 在美国交易中占主导地位的期权做市商在欧洲的交易量中占据了更大份额。【原文：The option market makers that dominate US trading are taking a bigger share of volume in Europe.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空将继续运营 A380 巨无霸客机直至下一个十年结束
item.description: 阿联酋航空计划将其庞大的空中客车A380双层客机机队运营到下个十年末，因为这家全球最大的国际航空公司正努力延长这架飞机的使用寿命，这架飞机曾为其在全球航线上的主导地位奠定了基础。【原文：Emirates plans to keep its giant fleet of Airbus SE A380 double-deckers in operation until the end of next decade, as the world’s largest international airline seeks to extend the lifespan of an aircraft that helped lay the foundation for its dominance on global routes.】

item.title: 加沙援助站附近遭袭，至少 22 人丧生
item.description: 至少有 22 人在加沙地带的两个援助物资分发站附近丧生，这是以色列和美国为排挤哈马斯而支持的新人道主义救援行动遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：At least 22 people were killed in near two aid-distribution stations in the Gaza Strip, the latest setback to a new humanitarian relief operation backed by Israel and the US as a way of sidelining Hamas.】

item.title: 通货紧缩蚕食收入，中国房屋销售持续低迷
item.description: 5 月份，中国的住宅销售继续下滑，表明房地产市场的低迷仍在拖累因通货紧缩和贸易紧张局势而承压的经济。【原文：China’s residential property sales continued to fall on in May, signaling the real estate slump is still weighing on an economy that’s under pressure from deflation and trade tensions.】

item.title: 东南亚与欧洲一道呼吁保护海底电缆
item.description: 来自欧洲和东南亚的国防官员呼吁加强合作，保护全球海底电缆网络，因为人们越来越担心这一重要基础设施受到威胁。【原文：Defense officials from Europe and Southeast Asia called for stronger collaboration to protect the global network of subsea cables as concerns grow over threats to this vital infrastructure.】

item.title: 孟加拉国指控前总理哈西娜犯有反人类罪
item.description: 孟加拉国检察官正式指控前总理谢赫-哈西娜和两名高级官员涉嫌在 2024 年学生领导的起义中参与暴力镇压，犯有反人类罪。【原文：Bangladeshi prosecutors officially charged former prime minister Sheikh Hasina and two senior officials with crimes against humanity for their alleged roles in violent crackdowns during the 2024 student-led uprising.】

item.title: 美国贸易战适得其反，欧洲股市主导全球市场
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战阻碍美国金融市场之际，欧洲经济前景一片光明，欧洲股市成为全球明显的赢家。【原文：Europe’s equities have emerged clear winners worldwide as the region’s economic outlook brightens at a time when President Donald Trump’s trade war hobbles US financial markets.】

item.title: 伊朗拒绝接受国际原子能机构的报告，称其无意制造核弹
item.description: 伊朗批评了联合国核监督机构指责其违反核规定的新报告，声称该机构是出于政治动机，并重申伊朗并不寻求原子武器。【原文：Iran criticized a new report by the UN nuclear watchdog accusing it of nuclear violations, claiming the agency is motivated by politics and reiterating it isn’t seeking atomic weapons.】

item.title: 俄罗斯称客运列车上的桥梁坍塌造成七人死亡
item.description: 俄罗斯说，在与乌克兰接壤的布良斯克地区，一座桥梁倒塌，压毁了从桥下通过的一列火车，造成至少七人死亡，数十人受伤。【原文：Russia said at least seven people died and dozens were injured after a bridge collapsed in the region of Bryansk, which borders Ukraine, crushing a train passing underneath.】

item.title: 波音公司称取代 737 Max 的新机型并非当务之急：金融时报
item.description: 飞机制造商首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）在接受《金融时报》采访时表示，推出新飞机取代最畅销的波音 737 Max 并不是当务之急。【原文：Launching a new aircraft to replace the best-selling Boeing 737 Max isn’t an immediate priority, the aircraft manufacturer’s Chief Executive Officer Kelly Ortberg told the Financial Times in an interview.】

item.title: 传播宏观经济福音的斯坦利-费舍尔逝世，享年81岁
item.description: 斯坦利-费舍尔（Stanley Fischer）去世了，他是宏观经济学的教授和实践者，曾帮助指导以色列和美国两国的中央银行，并指导了年轻一代的经济决策者。享年 81 岁。【原文：Stanley Fischer, a professor and practitioner of macroeconomics who helped guide central banks in two countries, Israel and the US, and mentored a younger generation of economic decision-makers, has died. He was 81.】

item.title: 加拿大野火迫使油砂区居民撤离，石油运输中断
item.description: 加拿大西部野火肆虐，迫使成千上万人逃离家园，现在也促使人们撤离阿尔伯塔省北部的油砂项目。【原文：Raging Western Canadian wildfires that have forced thousands of people from their homes are now also prompting evacuations from oilsands projects in northern Alberta.】

item.title: 越南提议投资 20 亿美元建设东北部赌场度假村：越南快报
item.description: 据 VnExpress 国际新闻网站报道，越南财政部正在为位于联合国教科文组织世界遗产下龙湾所在地--东北部广宁省的 51.5 万亿盾（19.8 亿美元）豪华赌场综合体提出一项投资政策。【原文：Vietnam’s Ministry of Finance is proposing an investment policy for a 51.5 trillion dong ($1.98 billion) luxury casino complex in the northeastern province of Quang Ninh, home to Unesco World Heritage Site Ha Long Bay, VnExpress International news website reported.】

item.title: 关税威胁和政治风险导致韩国出口下降
item.description: 随着全球需求疲软以及唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）全面推进关税政策的不确定性加深，韩国 5 月份出口萎缩，凸显出这个依赖贸易的经济体面临着日益严峻的挑战。【原文：South Korea’s exports contracted in May, underscoring growing challenges for the trade-reliant economy as global demand weakens and uncertainties deepen over Donald Trump’s sweeping tariff push.】

item.title: 英国央行布里登认为英国劳动力市场趋于宽松：星期日泰晤士报
item.description: 英国央行负责金融稳定事务的副行长萨拉-布里登（Sarah Breeden）在接受《星期日泰晤士报》采访时表示，她认为英国劳动力市场正在放松，同时她认为 "通货紧缩的浪潮 "仍在继续。【原文：Bank of England’s Sarah Breeden believes the UK labor market is loosening, while she sees “waves of disinflation” continuing, according to an interview the central bank deputy governor for financial stability gave to Sunday Times.】
